Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted and offers unparalleled value. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its true worth and the impact it can have on your business or lifestyle, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $9,500. This price reflects its high quality and the exclusivity it brings. I trust you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing how it could be a valuable addition to your world. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
